meanings.definition: The 20th letter of the Greek alphabet.
meanings.sent1: In the Greek alphabet, upsilons comes after tau.
meanings.sent2: I learned about upsilons in my Greek language class.
meanings.sent3: The upsilons looked like a little 'u' with a tail!
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so neat that even the upsilons were perfectly formed.
meanings.sent5: The upsilons stood out on the page, making it easy to spot.

meanings.definition: A symbol representing a high front rounded vowel in the International Phonetic Alphabet.
meanings.sent1: Linguists use upsilons to represent specific vowel sounds.
meanings.sent2: When studying phonetics, understanding the upsilons is crucial.
meanings.sent3: The upsilons symbol reminded me of a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: Her pronunciation was so clear, each upsilons sounded distinct.
meanings.sent5: The upsilons symbol helped me differentiate between similar sounds.
